00020 #ifndef H_UNITTEST_BAD
00021 #define H_UNITTEST_BAD
00022 
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 #include <rdkcore/serialization/read.h>
00025 #include <rdkcore/serialization/write.h>
00026 #include <fstream>
00027 #include <cppunit/TestCase.h>
00028 
00029 namespace RDK2 { namespace UnitTest { namespace Serialization {
00030 
00031     using namespace std;
00032     using namespace RDK2::Serialization;
00033 
00038     template<class X>
00039     class SerializationTestBad : public CppUnit::TestCase { 
00040         public: 
00041             X*x; Writer*w; Reader*r; 
00042             
00043             SerializationTestBad( std::string name,
00044             X*x, Writer*w, Reader*r) : CppUnit::TestCase( name ),
00045                 x(x), w(w), r(r) {}
00046     
00047             void runTest() {
00048                 try {
00049                     // nota: true perchï¿½ abbiamo dei test che usano il nome
00050                     // della classe
00051                      std::string buffer1 = w->serialize(true,x);     
00052                      X x2; r->deserialize(buffer1, &x2);
00053                      string buffer2 = w->serialize(true,&x2);
00054                      
00055                      CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("I expected an assertion to be generated", false);
00056                 } catch(SerializationException e) {
00057                     cerr << "ok: " << e.what() << endl; 
00058                 }
00059             }
00060     };
00061     
00062 }}} // namespace RDK2::UnitTest::Serialization
00063 
00064 #endif
